events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and keywords related to vehicle collision.
An agent was promptly assigned to the case to provide the customer with personalized assistance and next steps.
The claim has been acknowledged and the customer was informed that the investigation process has officially begun.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report for further evaluation.
Customer uploaded all required documents including images of the car damage and the official accident report.
The claim investigation started with verification of submitted documents and contacting involved parties for statements.
Investigation concluded confirming the incident details and assessing fault and damage extent on the vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on repair estimates and policy coverage terms.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication throughout.
The claim was officially approved and the payment processing stage was initiated as per the agreed settlement.
Payment was issued to cover vehicle repairs and any associated costs outlined in the settlement agreement.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming repairs were completed and the customer had no further questions.
All claim records were archived securely for future reference in accordance with company policy.
